title: Milan Criteria for Liver Transplantation
desc: The Milan Criteria Assess suitability of patients for liver transplant with cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma.

data.evidence:
• Single tumor with diameter ≤5 cm OR up to 3 tumors, each with diameter ≤3 cm, AND
  • No major vessel or extra-hepatic involvement.
